channel.title: Grid Cells on Tom George
channel.description: Recent content in Grid Cells on Tom George

item.title: PhD Thesis: Computational Models of Learning and Representations in the Hippocampal Formation
SIMPL: Scalable and hassle-free optimisation of neural representations from behaviour
item.description: An efficient technique for optimising tuning curves starting from behaviour by iteratively refitting the tuning curves and redecoding the latent variables.

item.title: RatInABox, a toolkit for modelling locomotion and neuronal activity in continuous environments
item.description: This paper documents and motivates the RatInABox package, used for modellign locomotion and neural activity.
